website_summaries.verdict: An electric hedge trimmer with a 2.7-amp motor for light duty that's close to a power source.
pros: Works well on bushes and shrubs
Works on pampas grass and other weeds and tall grasses
cons: Does not work well on branches over 1/4 inches thick

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! Nearly purchased the high dollar stihl hedge trimmer before stumbling upon this one on Amazon with great ratings. Well, they were not kidding. We only have about 10 bushes but this thing cut through just about anything and was extremely efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew this thing would do such a great job? I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J-Mart

customer_reviews.title: I got a whole 3 minutes out of it...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a lemon or if this hedger is just a piece of junk. After 3 minutes the motor overheated and melted all the plastic around it. The blades ceased to function. Didn't even get through a single bush...
customer_reviews.author: Chris87

customer_reviews.title: though it's surely not recommended. This has worked well for me
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this, rather expecting something poor-quality since the price was low. I'm still on my first season with this, but have been quite impressed with it. I've used it to keep hedges trimmed and vines cut back, and have found that it's even able to cut through soft branches up to perhaps a half-inch thick. Trimming growth through a chain-link fence, I managed to get bits of the fence caught in between the blades on several occasions. Remarkably, no damage seems to have resulted, though it's surely not recommended. This has worked well for me, and really exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Solid basic trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer was quite honestly much better than I expected. I trimmed an out of control hedge row and multiple box woods very very easily. Even thicker branches this trimmer handled great. Highly recommend this if you’re in no mood to spend $100+ dollars on a cordless trimmer and want just a solid basic trimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised Model has been cheapened
customer_reviews.text: Evidently there as been a change in this model number that is clearly inferior. First, the same model number as delivered does not have a rotating handle as described and shown in the picture, which would be handy. Also the capacity in the owners manual is 17mm which equates to .669", less than the 3/4" (.75) as advertised. The company has cheapened this trimmer and retained the same model number and description which is not accurate or ethical. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Snydes

customer_reviews.title: Usually with a low cost you don't get great quality.
customer_reviews.text: So I was a little nervous about purchasing this. Usually with a low cost you don't get great quality... I bought it in October and FINALLY (almost April) put it to use! This thing works amazing! It went through everything I put it against. Has a safety feature on it so if you let go of one part of the what makes it go it will stop. I didn't put it to the test of super big branches but it did go through some fairly thick ones with a little force. I am very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole C. Cunningham-williamson

customer_reviews.title: I found it easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have used an electric trimmer. I found it easy to use. It is fairly lightweight. It doesn't give a much fine control as my old school manual clipper, however that may be due to my inexperience with the power trimmer. With this trimmer I was able to to the job in about half the time it would take me to do it manually. Even if I have to do a little follow up manual trimming, this tool is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer27

customer_reviews.title: Grat tool for such a low price.
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't expecting too much because of the very low price. I was pleasantly surprised by how well this product worked. I had several large shrubs to trim and I was amazed at how effortless the tool worked. I had owned amuch more expensive trimmer, but it paled in comparison to this one. Great Buy!!! I recommend it highly. Jeff from Savannah
customer_reviews.author: J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Complete Trash, Pay $20 More For a Real Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Broke within the first hour, complete trash, spend the extra $20 to buy something that will last you a lifetime instead of this cheap piece of junk that's made in china and imported to the US and sold at 4x the manufacture cost.
customer_reviews.author: Top Review

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong trimmer, no rotating handle
customer_reviews.text: I did order the HT04B00 trimmer but the one I got does not rotate. No button like the one in the picture. Tried to call and after over 15 minutes on hold, I hung up. Tried to leave a comment on the wier web page and that did not work. It does nlook like a very nice trimmer, but not what the picture and description says. Can I get sent a replacement that rotates?
customer_reviews.author: OriderUSA

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: This little trimmer works well for the occasional uses that we have in our home garden, likely just for fall trimming. With a light weight plastic case, it's not a tool for a professional landscaper. The cutter bar is pretty well guarded, it would be hard to injure yourself with it. It's light weight, my wife can easily handle it and upkeep ought to be minimal with its electric motor.. For the price, for the purpose we have, terrific.
customer_reviews.author: RWS

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: i have used this edge trimmer probably less than 10 times. i only use it in two boxwoods and it just died on me less than i year since i purchased it. what a bummer
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This little guy puttered out on a thin twig hedge. It doesn't have too much power. Importantly, it sparked when it burned out. Watch out for fire hazards. It was good while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Kia H

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Phoenix area and grass is not in abundance, especially in my yard. I had a weed eater to cut it, but after a couple of years it no longer works even after little use. I purchased this to cut grass, not hedges, but it serves the purpose (although my knees and back get a workout). For my small yard, I'm happy with it, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Loose plug led to painful accident
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it the plug kept coming loose as it wasn’t a tight fit when I plugged it in to my extension lead. This led to it constantly going on and off as it came loose, Second time using it same happened and as I tried to make sure the plug was tight it restarted and I sliced through my finger. If you find yours is loose send it back straight away I’m past the window for returning otherwise I would.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tool far exceeded my expectations. I do very little yard work but I have a client who will do none. I bought the trimmer to help him shape his exterior environment. Tis was supposed to be a one shot deal. I have since lent this unit to several other of my clients and have heard more praise in performance. I will keep this company in mind for future unpleasantries.
customer_reviews.author: stilletto

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect this
customer_reviews.text: It is much lighter than my old gas hedger. I opted for the cord type as I have three very good extension cords (2 and 3) prong. The big plus is the cutting quality. It went through my hibiscus as if it was butter. Ivy, no problem. I had to stop because there was no room left in the green container. Trash was picked up yesterday. More to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Failed in a year.
customer_reviews.text: Failed in a year. Minimal use. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Balekar

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Even though I was hesitant to buy an unknown brand I decided to buy this clipper based on the positive Amazon reviews. I have a gas powered Still clipper than easily cuts 1⁄2" diameter holly, but it is very heavy for work above chest level. I just used this one a week ago on some Yaupon Holly I allow to grow about 5-6 feet high. It handled the job perfectly. Very lightweight and has very good cutting power. NO complaints. Yes, I can recommend it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Archi

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This little machine did very well. I liked it and enjoyed using it because it's very lightweight easy on your back you can do a few things one handed. Very good price for what it is. But if you're opening up a landscaping business this would not be the ideal tool for the job. But for the everyday person that wants to touch up their yard here in there or keep it clean themselves is a perfect tool I personally loved it
customer_reviews.author: Metooyou

customer_reviews.title: Light weight easy to use for a 73 yr old lady
customer_reviews.text: I tried the trimmer out on a large shrub that has always been hard to trim into a nice round shape. Not any more! It was like cutting through butter, and so easy to get the shape I wanted. Since I am pretty old I really appreciate that it is light weight and oh so easy to handle. My yard is looking so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It's good.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of greenworks corded products. They are cheaper then the battery powered versions and they products are very good. This cuts hedges very well for a very reasonable price. I've used it about once a month since I've owned it and it still works like new. Which is what any good product does.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hedge trimmer because it was reasonably priced and I didn't have that much to trim each year. It arrived quickly and was well packaged. I used it this weekend and it worked great! It had enough power to trim a bush that had some branches measuring about 3/8 - 1/2 inch. Perfectly priced solution for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: lucyb

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with the durability of this hedge trimmer, because of the price, but bought it anyway. I used it and it does an excellent job, it’s lightweight and easy to handle, even with one hand. I had a bunch of vines and bushes to trim, and the green works tackled it like a pro. Extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I read some reviews. Really!! I think there are a lot of buyers who haven’t used a trimmer. I replaced my heavy duty Craftsman with this and so far it has outperformed it hands down. It is much lighter and cuts larger branches. I already got my money’s worth doing all my spring trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Price, Amazing Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical given the price and the fact that it's electric. Boy did it prove me wrong. This thing is a work horse. I finished trimming my hedges in a fraction of the time it would take with shears and it was able to mow through everything like a hot knife through butter, it even managed to cut a few of the thicker branches. Absolutely recommend purchasing without hesitation
customer_reviews.author: Super Nintendo Chalmers

customer_reviews.title: What cord are you using?
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one and I found out why, that I was not using the right powered ext.cord and it will not last that long! I found that out this time as it ran so slow and I had purchased a extension cord offered in my sale which was incorrect to use! I tried to contact the person but couldn't to tell them to check into this. I purchased a 100 ft 14 gauge.That's why my other one didn't last as long. I guess we learn as we go....
customer_reviews.author: TUNEIN4

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth purchasing if you're in need of a hedge trimmer. You wouldn't think you'd be getting much for the cost of it but as it turns out it's an excellent tool. As soon as I got it in I put it to use and it didn't disappoint. The durability of it will only show with time but it seems to be built well and it runs great. It made quick work of the trimming I had to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The product Amazon describes is not the product they are shipping
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one Greenworks 22-Inch 4 AMP Corded Hedge Trimmer HT04B00 and received a "newer" model with far less features. Amazon shipped a second saying it would be what was described. It was not. Amazon continues to show and describe a product that they are not shipping. The newer model does not have the rotating motor, it does not have the padded handle. The "newer" model does not compare with what Amazon describes. Do yourself a favor and find a different item as you will be disappointed with what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Makarevich

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, easy to use and cuts well
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, cuts easily thick branches and the pig-tail connection cord is far better than our old one that had the plug connection right inside the handle. With this it's easy to tie the cords together as not to disconnect accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Klintehamn

customer_reviews.title: Did good work
customer_reviews.text: Good low cost trimmers. No bologna just a low cost pair that cuts bushes and does what it is suppose to do. Seems pretty sturdily made.
customer_reviews.author: Iseedumbpeople

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The plastic probably saved my life when I cut through the electrical extension cord the first day. :-) I ordered a new electric extension cord. I'll try to be more careful. Never was good with tools or doing stuff. Ask my ex-wife.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Muncy

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good. I was expecting this trimmer to be weak and not cut well but wow was i surprised. This trimmer packs a good punch in it and gets the job done. Its electric powered so you just plug it up to the electricity and its ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: De La Fox Checks

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool,  decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use, handles small bits easily. It struggled a little with the older branches of the boxwood elder hedge; but skimmed easily between the hedge and fencing. Makes working in the yard much easier. Need a long cord, though. :D
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I waited so long
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. I can't believe I waited this long to order this. My shrub along the entire front of my house was so overgrown, and this chopped right through and was so fast. I was worried being on a step stool with this tool and a plug but it's so lightweight and was so easy to use. It took me less than an hour and most of that time was clean up. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Webb

customer_reviews.title: but it did great. For $25 bucks I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to save some money compared with other trimmers. Read some of the old reviews about them melting due to over heating, but I never had this problem. I trimmed shrubs for a couple hours and never had a problem. I even cut hedge branches that were probably a bit to thick for the trimmer, but it did great. For $25 bucks I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greenworks Trimmer is Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased the Greenworks Hedge Trimmer. I finally used it over the weekend and it cut my work in half (literally). The Trimmer is easy to work with and does an amazing job of trimming shrubs and small trees. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Needed for a 20 foot section of wall vines. Bogged down with a few 1/2”+ pieces but I wouldn’t expect it to tackle that much. Also cut through extension cord like butter (user error).
customer_reviews.author: Jacob D.

customer_reviews.title: Get this one
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Impressed. Did an incredible job on my entire landscape. My wife couldn't believe how fast it cuts. What took her two days around the pool I knocked out in 45 minutes. Don't let the idea of a plastic blade worry you. Those blades are tough. For the price and if you are like me and will only use it once or twice a year it's the right product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The 30 minutes it worked, it really worked great
customer_reviews.text: Died after 30 minutes. I've gotten to life for a few seconds at a time since then, but then it dies quickly. Our very handy friend (he can fix anything) has not had luck with this. What's extra frustrating is that those were a great 30 minutes--it was (briefly) a great trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: MokeyDavis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing price, excellent tool. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Look no further, green-works makes a great product. You cannot beat the price also. No need to spend a lot of money you will be very pleased in the performance of this machine. It also cuts through thick bushes and a very timely fashion. I cannot say enough about it I highly recommend it, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It's too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Only the second time using this trimmer in 2017, I accidentally, very lightly touched the tip to my concrete sidewalk, and it killed the motor permanently. I replaced it with a Black and Decker trimmer instead, which does not have this sensitivity issue.
customer_reviews.author: W. Barber

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very satisfying
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this product is priced so cheap. Very high quality product. It works great on the small branches. I was hesitant to approach thicker branches but it had no problem cutting them either. The very thick ones I have to go on the few times to cut them. Works like an electric saw rather than a cheap hedge trimmer. Very impressed. No sure about durability because I only used it once so far and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D

customer_reviews.title: Good shrub trimmer/ lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to handle. The cord is only maybe 10 inches long, so of course you have to have a long extension cord. We used the trimmer to trim bushes. It would not cut through actual tree branches. It is made for soft bushes. It makes shaping your bushes a quick and easy job. Be sure to clean your blades after using it. I just wiped them off very well and put a little WD40 on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but powerful. I especially like that it has cutting teeth on both sides. It does has a safety latch which takes some getting used to. Works perfectly every single time. It has enough power to cut right through small branches and twigs. Its noisy but not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two uses
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice and it's stopped working completely. Nothing happens when it's plugged in, turned on, and I attempt to start the blades. I've sent amazon a message about this and they sent me a link to the user's manual. I've been a prime member for years and I'm very dissatisfied with this product and the way it's being handled.
customer_reviews.author: sara rebecca smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Green Machine
customer_reviews.text: Just what the (tree) doctor ordered. Great weight, easy to cut branches and bushes with fair sized limbs(pinky finger size) with no issues.The 22 inch bar is perfect for our trimming needs. Very quiet when running. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: zakosdad

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on large bushes
customer_reviews.text: I tend to like corded rather than cordless so if you want cordless, move on to another product. It's not a defect in this product that's designed to be corded. I was pleasantly surprised b yhow much power this thing had given that it's so light and easy to lift. I was able to do very quick trimming of bushes and shrubs with some pretty think branches. Obviously thicker branches require some other mode of cutter, but for most of the part that needed trimming, this sailed right through it with little effort on my part. Very good product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: What a powerful little hedger! I'm a 66 year old woman and this was lightweight and easy to use. My hibiscus bush had grown out of control and had some fairly thick branches, but this cut right through them. Very pleased with the product P.S. Just don't be a dumb dumb like me and saw right through the green extension cord. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: drgnldy

customer_reviews.title: Handle does not rotate.
customer_reviews.text: The HT04B00 trimmer handle does not rotate as stated in both the product description bullets and full product description on amazon.com. The owners manual for the HT04B00 does not indicate the handle rotates. So, amazon should update their product descriptions to remove their false advertising. While the product did not arrive as described by amazon, the non-rotating handle trimmer works great. I easily trimmed all the bushes on my property when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this. Right out of the box I plugged it in and mowed down a whole bush with it. At times I had to slow down a bit because it was getting overpowered but keeping that in mind I was able to do just what I wanted to with it.
customer_reviews.author: Deserteagle

customer_reviews.title: If I can do this, anyone can
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get my bushes under control. I plugged it in and did the job without a hitch. Trimmer is light and easy to use. Does a great job and the price was right. Keep the cord over your shoulder so you know where it is and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSue

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool, great price
customer_reviews.text: Cut right through even some thicker Rhodie branches. Easy to use, makes quick work of yard trimming. Little heavier than what I'd used before...but a good solid feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy - Broke after two Uses
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice on bushes and it failed, I missed shipping it back to a refund by one day so I am stuck with a broken Hedge Trimmer. I will never buy another Greenworks product. I suggest you look elsewhere for a cheap trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: and im fairly happy with this tool
customer_reviews.text: my first hedge trimmer purchase, and im fairly happy with this tool. works well isnt scary to use. my only complain is the plug, the durn thing never stays plugged in. if you move it comes unplugged from the extension cord. my dear husband says i cannot tape it together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me - light weight
customer_reviews.text: perfect for me - light weight, easy to put together and use - I absolutely love it - and my yard looks so much better
customer_reviews.author: rhaab

customer_reviews.title: Not the one advertised
customer_reviews.text: The one you'll recieve is not the one discribed.Returned and recieved the same one again. The one you'll get doesn't have the rotating handle,very disappointed. Guess I'll keep because I needed one. Don't buy if you think your getting the one advertised
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: First time home buyer tool (garbage)
customer_reviews.text: Update: This is literally garbage, after first year, it started to get loud without cutting anything, can’t sharpen or replace blades Short time review: this thing can GO, not super heavy, I like the length and the safety feature. This is a short term review, Durability review will come after few months
customer_reviews.author: Omar Sami 🎤

customer_reviews.title: Great little hedge trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a big backyard and this is just perfect for the hedges I need to trim. It works well, strong engine and very easy to use. Price was perfect for what I expected. Definitely am glad I purchased this hedge trimmer. I was so impressed I ordered a weed wacker and am hoping for the same quality as this hedger.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: says it powers through our hedges easily. It handles easily and despite our large garden ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trimmer when our battery operated one started faltering. My wife loves this replacement, says it powers through our hedges easily. It handles easily and despite our large garden the cord does not seem to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Prindle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am using GreenWorks Hedge Trimmer for more than a Year. Till date I used it for more than 4-5 times. This is trimmer is very easy to use. Low maintenance product. 18 inch blade is really convenient to operate and have very good reach to the big bushes. I will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used an electric hedge trimmer prior to purchasing this one. However, we have several bushes around our new home that were very much in need of maintenance. This trimmer was easy to use, which was very important for me and did a great job. We have several very large bushes on our property and it took care of all of them with no problems. It was easy to use and lightweight and even better - look at the price. You can't beat it for the price and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kris-a-Lis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to get the hang of a corded electric trimmer as I cut into 2 extension cords in the beginning. Works great but I should have bought the 22" as I need that extra 4" Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used for first time today and was very pleased with the quality of the Greenworks hedge trimmers. It cut through very overgrown shrubs with ease, including some thicker dead wood. The extension cord hook is also a great bonus to keep you from accidentally unplugging while working. For the cost, this is an essential tool.
customer_reviews.author: Nedraw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great. For the price, it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked well with medium thickness underbrush and for shaping garden bushes. Suggest slow and one direction first then reverse with a sweeping motion.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Goods

customer_reviews.title: Nice for lighter trim jobs up to 1/8 inch.
customer_reviews.text: I need a tool that could cut down a few bushy plants before the cold weather set it. handled my needs easily. I didn't need a monster trimmer for a half a dozen bushes each year. Filled the bill and well made. I cust some twigs up to 3/8 inch. What a deal! Huzzar!
customer_reviews.author: bojo360

customer_reviews.title: worked great trimming the bushes in front of the house
customer_reviews.text: worked great trimming the bushes in front of the house. didnt have any issues with branches in the .25 to .5 inch diameter. maybe thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Ken W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 10 minutes, then the engine sparked and it didn't turn on again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Conley

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with how well this works. It is one of the less expensive models and I was pleasantly surprised. I wanted a trimmer that wouldn't be too heavy but still do the job. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Nic

customer_reviews.title: Brand New
customer_reviews.text: This item was brand new, never used. It's original box was torn. The Amazon box covered that minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but if you're a putz like me...
customer_reviews.text: think about getting a gas powered hedge trimmer. I cut through one power cord already, but you also need to be mindful not to step on the cord. This ain't a toy. You could easily lose a finger if you are not very careful. No way I would take this up on a ladder to do the tops of my hedges. That said, it works very well and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rose

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give 0 stars because it wouldn’t ever turn on. Cheap piece of plastic. Don’t waste your money- buy at a store from a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Carsone

customer_reviews.title: for experience edgers
customer_reviews.text: wife thought it be nice for her to trim our edges and cut the exstenion cord within a minute
customer_reviews.author: Ritchie Cuthbertson

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my mother...and you should too.
customer_reviews.text: Okay...so I bought this for my mother for a mother's day gift (don't judge me)...she was tired of waiting on me to come by and trim her hedges and this was the least expensive option with impressive reviews. Long story short, my mother's hedges are trimmed and upon my most recent visit even she was singing the praises of the strength and versatility of this item.
customer_reviews.author: RGM

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite yard tool
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite yard tool. This helped a ton when I needed to trim our summer grass and bushes. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Emstar

customer_reviews.title: works well and at a great price. a little shorter blade than I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: works well and at a great price. a little shorter blade than I thought it would be but overall happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect product description
customer_reviews.text: The product description for this item is anaccurate. The model HT04B00 does not have a rotating handle. The product is usable butI should receive a partial refund since the product shown without the rotating handle $10.50 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Product this far is working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact no need for putting gas or having to deal with starting a motor. It just works, no noise, good for the environment....great product.
customer_reviews.author: HJm

customer_reviews.title: The only thing better would be a rechargeable battery
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple of times but it seems to work very well. The only thing better would be a rechargeable battery, but that's not going to happen at that price. I found it very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Great, sharp and light
customer_reviews.text: Better than a trimmer I paid three times the amount. The cord holder makes sure the plug is not vibrated loose. I use it on shrubs - even cut well through large rosemary bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Down2Earth

customer_reviews.title: Great hedge trimmer for most home hedge trimming use.
customer_reviews.text: This was rated highly by Consumer Report, and my experience says they steered me right. Light weight, sharp, and does a good job. The only caveat might be for someone pruning very heavy hedges where a more powerful unit designed for heavy use might be better. But for most home use this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Berauer

customer_reviews.title: ( ̄`'•.  ̧( ̄`'•.  ̧EXCeLLENT AMAZon TRANSaCTION ̧. •'' ̄) ̧. ...
customer_reviews.text: ( ̄`'•. ̧( ̄`'•. ̧EXCeLLENT AMAZon TRANSaCTION ̧.•'' ̄) ̧.•'' ̄) THaNK YoU, (。^‿^ )... 5⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Fred d

customer_reviews.title: Gears stripped fast
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first few times, then I noticed it wasn't cutting hardly anything. I took it in to my local service guy and he said the gears were all stripped. I couldn't believe it as I only used it a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Hreed

customer_reviews.title: super product!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how super these GreenWorks products are. I ordered this because I fell in love with the mower and then I fell in love with this. These products are so well engineered and so user friendly. It cut some really tough hedges like they were butter!! It's light, cuts like a dream, and makes lawn work really easy. I couldn't recommend GreenWorks products more.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is excellent for the money. Small townhouse with 5 bushes as it did the job with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: KillaChap

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing a used item from Amazon and I have nothing negative to say. It seriously works like new! Will be using more often.
customer_reviews.author: LeiaLukeSilverLabs

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Perfect for my hedges in front of my house Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Gina53

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. One slight problem i have is keeping my drop cord plug from falling off the prongs.
customer_reviews.author: kemper pope

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised, not a name brand gas powered trimmer, but for the hedges around the house it is just great! Easy to plug in to outside outlets and just walk around the house to clean up shrubbery and hedges. No gas to mix, quiet and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brand to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING brand! This is the second thing we have bought that is Greenworks brand. Our first purchase was a blower and it exceeded our expectations! So I was happy to purchase this next! Very affordable. Don’t be afraid of the price. Inexpensive and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: James & Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Really light. Works well. Doesn't get clogged. I highly recommend it. I'm a 64 year old woman who had never used a hedge clipper before and I got great results.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ondray

customer_reviews.title: Great for medium sized projects
customer_reviews.text: We have several boxwood shrubs that need trimming a couple times a year. Not enough to own something too powerful, and not small enough to want to chop them all down by hand shearing. This trimmer is the perfect low cost option and saves a ton of time.
customer_reviews.author: MI Book Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good light clipper
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job it is light weight so I can use it Not up to heavy duty clipping though.
customer_reviews.author: ej

customer_reviews.title: Updated after 4 years of use!
customer_reviews.text: cannot go wrong for the price, the only bad thing i can see so far, is not being cordless, which is obvious. These are great trimmers....UPDATE: after four years of usage, these things are still going strong, easy to operate, easy to maneuver, and work just as good now as they did four years ago! I have five barberry bushes that require trimming every two weeks, I hate them, but am happy I have these trimmers!
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well to trim a difficult hedge.
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful. It's relatively light. It's easy to use. It exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: DAVID M DIGIOIA

customer_reviews.title: Cuts less than didley
customer_reviews.text: Tried it. Supreme fail. It's going to Goodwill. Say something nice = still looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a house with a couple shrubs out front and this does the job easily without having to fire up a gas powered one.
customer_reviews.author: isbilly

customer_reviews.title: Great hedge trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, and well packaged. However, the best part is how well it works. I don't have a lot of bushes that need trimming/shaping, but for those I have this worked great! Not too heavy, and easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: RhinestoneByrd

product_meta.title: Greenworks 18-Inch 2.7 Amp Corded Hedge Trimmer 22102
product_meta.description:
Style:2.7 Amp Trimmer22102 Features: -Hedge trimmer. -2.7A Power. -Dual action. -18" or 9/16" Cutting length. Use: -Hedge Trimmers. Product Type: -Hand Held. Power: -Corded. Dimensions: Overall Product Weight: -7.26 Pounds.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The GreenWorks products that you purchase have a ZERO carbon footprint. We'll say that again - our entire product line will never release an ounce of carbon emission into the air. 4 Year Warranty - Double The Industry Standard. When looking for lawn tools, we know you're thinking about quality. You're looking for something that will get the job done and get you back to your weekend. That's why GreenWorks backs every tool with a full four-year warranty - we know our products will perform at the highest level and always be reliable. GreenWorks high quality products are manufactured to last. That's why we back every product with a warranty that's twice the industry standard. We'll provide all the power you need without polluting the air or forcing you to keep hauling your gas can to the nearest station (especially in the middle of a mow). No more tune-ups or maintenance. No more emissions. Fifty-four million Americans mow their lawns every weekend, according to the EPA, using 800 million gallons of gas each year. Along the way, homeowners spill more than 17 million gallons of gas while refueling. That's equivalent to the 1989 Exxon Valdez disaster. It's time to move beyond clumsy, harmful gas-powered mowers. It's time for GreenWorks to be your lawn tools for life.
feature_bullets: 2.7 Amp Electric Motor gets the job done efficiently
18-Inch dual action steel blade for optimal performance and maneuvering
3/8-Inch Cutting Capacity, perfect for bushes and shrubs
Lightweight design for better handling and less user fatigue
Convenient cord lock to prevent accidental unplugging
